Research Paper Library Manager

- Single-file HTML web app for cataloging and searching academic papers
- Users can add papers with title, authors, year, DOI/URL, abstract, and custom tags
- Search/filter papers by title, author, year range, or tags with real-time results
- Responsive grid layout (1 column mobile, 2 columns tablet, 3 columns desktop) displaying papers as cards
- Each card shows title, authors, year, tags, and a collapsible abstract section
- Dark mode and light mode toggle with auto-detection of system preference (prefers-color-scheme)
- All paper data persists to browser localStorage as JSON
- Export collected papers as JSON file for backup
- Import previously exported JSON file to restore library
- Full keyboard navigation: Tab through cards, Enter to expand/collapse abstract, Delete key to remove paper
- ARIA labels on buttons, form inputs, and interactive elements
- Sorting options: by date added, alphabetical by title, by year (ascending/descending)
- Bulk delete with confirmation dialog
- Print-friendly view (hides buttons, optimizes card layout)
- Search highlights matching text in real-time
- No external dependencies; uses only HTML5, CSS3, and vanilla JavaScript
